name: Carbon-Freezing
Lore: '''Oh, they''ve encased him in carbonite. He should be quite well protected. If he survived the freezing process, that is.''',
Text: 'Deploy on Carbonite Chamber. During your control phase, may target one captive present. Draw destiny. If destiny < 5, captive lost. If destiny > 10, place on captive. Captive is ''frozen'' and opponent loses 8 Force. If captive released, lose Effect. (Immune to Alter.)',
